definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: jasper (loan-word fr. Pers. ya4m so Ar. ya4bun Lane:2978, also (and on forms ya4fun, ya4mun) Frey; perh. As. ašpû Dl:HA 36, HWB:147)—[[תַּרְשִׁישׁ וְשׁׂהַם וְיׇֽשְׁפֵָה]] Ex 28:20, Ex 39:13 (both P) beryl and onyx and jasper (v.Di); [[וְיׇֽשְׁêֶפה]] (+id.) Ez Eze 28:13 (v. Sm).
